div.p: The Creative Commons sample pool just grew by 20,000 samples thanks to the two sites working together to act as one big sample and remix consortium.
Here are the steps to use the two sites together:

ul.li: Create an account at the freesound project web site.
Browse and download from the 20,000 samples found there. (Make sure to note which artists you sampled.)
Create a remix using those sounds and mix in your own sounds and any other Creative Commons licensed or legally safe samples.
Create an account here at here at ccMixter.

Upload your remix here at ccMixter using the Submit Remix form and follow these steps:
Select the 'Freesound' sample pool and search for the artists that you samples.
For each artist you sampled, enter their freesound name...
...and click on 'Search'
When the search results come back, check off the samples you used in your remix...
...and click 'Accept'
